summary: Set during the Sung Dynasty, patriotic monks of the Shaolin Temple fight against foreign invasion
cast: Chien-Chang Chen|Chien-Ho Chen|Ching Fa Liu|Chi-Ping Chang|Yi-Kuei Chang|Chia-Kai Chen|Tien-Chi Cheng|Sheng Chiang|Chan Kian Ching|Alan Chung San Chui|Wen-Jui Hsu|Fei-Lung Huang|Chang-Sheng Ko|Lung-Yin Li|Tso-Yung Li|Kuan-Wu Lung|Hai-Yung Shen|Chi Chin Wu|Kuo-Tung Yu
director: Director: Ta-Chao Lin (as Da Chiao Lin)
title: Shao Lin shi san gun seng
